title: An Interview with Laurie Price
creator_credit: Laurie Price, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Laurie Price is one of the remaining third of those Australians who served in Korea. He provides sharp detail of the work he performed there on the airfields, the distractions and tensions, even between allies. While the war is long over, it continues to affect Price even today.
creator_credit_for_label: Laurie Price, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
